modName: REAL GLASS and Ebony Weapons - No green tint
summary:
Combined Glass and Ebony weapons with glass stats - nothing overpowered.
The textures give a true stunning see through appearance without any green tint.
Shadows and light give great detail.
descriptionHtml:
Updates:
September 11 2014
- Cleaned the header for DLC requirements with TES5edit - only requires Skyrim
- Repacked textures, there should be no conflicts with other mods.
If you had conflicts or use a lot of mods, I would use the latest posted version, 1.2
As well it should run fine on stock Skyrim without expansions.

The original glass and most I could find did not give great effects in light/shadows.
This has no tint - translucent glass blades, and the appearance similar to ebony/daedric hilt workings.
They also reflect quite nicely.

They are not overpowered.Â  The stats are kept the same as original glass weaponry.
So they have a good base and your skill determines the rest as you progress.

The cache of weapons are washed up in a chest behind/beside the Riverwood Blacksmith porch, on the shore by a rock partially submerged in the water.
There are two of each for dual wielders and the chest is set to respawn.
author: xj3st3r
